h1_tag: Hi, I'm Andrew, a full-stack web developer.
about_p1: I am a friendly and enthusiastic full-stack software developer, passionate about the potential of coding to solve problems. In my spare time, I like reading, travel, cooking, swimming, and learning languages.
about_p2: After earning my degree in mechanical engineering and working for several years in the energy efficiency sector, I took a career break to travel and teach scuba diving before focusing on my interest in tech. I recently completed a 16 week full-stack coding bootcamp at iO Academy in Bath, UK and I am now seeking professional opportunities to start my career in software development.
portfolio_intro: Below is a selection of projects showcasing some of the technologies I've worked with.

projects.title: Gal√®re
projects.description: Explore the world of AI-generated art and share your creativity with friends and family using OpenAI. Users can upload images and generate imaginary descriptions. Share your creations with others in albums.

projects.title: Tubular
projects.description: A MERN stack route planner for the London Underground. Finds and displays both direct routes and routes requiring a change of station, based on start and end stations. (Uses mock data)

projects.title: CarpeDiem
projects.description: An OOP PHP application showcasing car listings with search, filter, and detailed information functionalities.

projects.title: ScranMaster
projects.description: A React food delivery app front-end built to match supplied high-fidelity wireframes. Features restaurant list, filtering, order basket, and progress tracking.

projects.title: WordRunner
projects.description: Test your vocabulary skills and have fun in this fast-paced word challenge with a limited number of attempts.
